faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
faq.teamHelp: Our team is here to help you
faq.travelerQ1: How do I book a tour?
faq.travelerA1: Explore guide profiles, choose the one you like best, and contact directly via WhatsApp. You can coordinate dates, prices, and tour details directly with the guide.
faq.travelerQ2: Is it safe to contact via WhatsApp?
faq.travelerA2: Yes. All our verified guides have passed an identity validation process. However, we always recommend verifying tour details, confirming prices in writing, and following safety best practices when traveling.
faq.travelerA3: Cancellation policies are set by each individual guide. We recommend agreeing on cancellation terms in writing with your guide before making any payment or reservation.
faq.travelerA4: Guides with the 'Verified Guide' badge have passed our verification process which includes: identity validation, proof of experience, photo verification, and background check.
faq.travelerQ5: What languages do the guides speak?
faq.travelerA5: Each guide profile shows the languages they speak. You can filter guides by language on the explore page to find one who speaks your native language.
faq.travelerA6: MySenda facilitates the connection between travelers and guides but does not process payments directly. Refund policies are set by each guide. For greater security, you can use our guaranteed payment option.
faq.guideQ1: How do I register as a guide?
faq.guideA1: Click on 'I'm a Tour Guide' on the home page, create an account with your email, complete your profile with photos and description, and add your tours. It's completely free!
faq.guideQ2: How much does it cost to create a profile?
faq.guideA2: Creating and maintaining your profile is 100% FREE. We do not charge any monthly or annual fees. You can publish all the tours you want at no cost.
faq.guideA3: You can coordinate payments directly with your clients (cash, transfer, etc.) without MySenda taking a commission. We also offer an optional integrated payment option.
faq.guideA4: We DO NOT charge commission on direct bookings. If a traveler contacts you via WhatsApp and pays directly, 100% of the payment is yours.
faq.guideA5: Complete your profile to 100%, upload a photo of your official ID, provide proof of your experience as a guide, and our team will review your application in 2-3 business days.
faq.guideA6: Yes! You can create unlimited tours on your profile. Each tour can have its own description, price, duration, and photos.
faq.techA1: Our integrated payment system (optional) uses secure processors. Funds are held until the tour is completed satisfactorily.
faq.techA2: Yes. We use SSL encryption, comply with international privacy standards, and never share your personal information without your consent.
faq.techQ3: In which countries is it available?
faq.techA3: Currently MySenda is focused on Mexico, but we are expanding to other Latin American countries.

cityFaq.needGuideAnswer: Although you can tour {city} on your own, hiring a certified local guide will allow you to discover hidden stories, access exclusive places, and better understand the local culture.

cityFaq.mustDoAnswer: In {city}, you cannot miss its historic center, local cuisine, and nearby archaeological zones. A local guide can customize an itinerary based on your interests.
